title: About Adarc Computer
description:
Adarc Computer is one of its kind and largest, specialized stores in the region for selling hardware, computer systems, information technology, and related services

Adarc Computer is located in the midst of Abu Dhabi city. Having built up a very solid and stable reputation for our quality products and services over the last one decade, Adarc Computer is the perfect choice, as we offer unrivalled expertise for all your IT Solutions and we are proud to have assisted thousands of customers since opening our first store back in August 2007.

title: What we really do?
description: Adarc Computer recognizes that today’s technology becomes obsolete tomorrow, so we keep a hawk’s eye on international trends and bring solutions that are essential, important, and worthy of investment.

title: Our Vision
description: Our motto is to become the top-of-mind recall as a solution provider and set benchmarks for customer satisfaction. We believe a strong customer orientation and commitment are key to achieving both our short-term and long-term goals. We are a passionate team of young entrepreneurs who believe in innovation, perseverance, commitment, conviction, creativity, dedication, determination, and efficiency through leadership and strategic thinking.

title: History of Beginning
description: Established in 2007, Adarc Computer has emerged as a major constituent of the IT redistribution industry in every part of the UAE. We are currently an authorized dealer for global leading brands.
